Click For Help

Click to catch rats in your kitchen, the quicker you catch them, the more score you will earn, just do it!

Don't let any rat run away!
Be careful, if the number of rats you missed is more than the level, you'll lose!

Occasionally, Jerry will come out looking for cheese, don't let him go since catching him will give you double socre!

If Tom coming, don't hit him otherwise you'll lose the game!

The level will be up if enough rats are caught. Along with level up, their running speed also increase.

Ok, catch'em All!
